headline: Teledyne Reveals FLIR MIX Multispectral Infrared Imaging Systems
summary: TDY presents FLIR MIX Starter Kits, an enhanced multispectral imaging system intended to increase the precision and detail of infrared imaging.

raw.headline: Teledyne Reveals FLIR MIX Multispectral Infrared Imaging Systems
raw.summary: TDY presents FLIR MIX Starter Kits, an enhanced multispectral imaging system intended to increase the precision and detail of infrared imaging.

headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Awarded $74.2M Contract for U.S. Army’s Next-Gen Nuclear, Biological and Chemical Reconnaissance Vehicle Sensor Suite Upgrade
summary: BOSTON, April 09, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), announced it has been awarded a four year, $74.2 million contract by the U.S. Army for continued development of the next-generation mounted reconnaissance capability for the M1135 Stryker’s Nuclear, Biological and Chemical Reconnaissance Vehicle (NBCRV) Sensor Suite Upgrade Program.

raw.headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Awarded $74.2M Contract for U.S. Army’s Next-Gen Nuclear, Biological and Chemical Reconnaissance Vehicle Sensor Suite Upgrade
raw.summary: BOSTON, April 09, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), announced it has been awarded a four year, $74.2 million contract by the U.S. Army for continued development of the next-generation mounted reconnaissance capability for the M1135 Stryker’s Nuclear, Biological and Chemical Reconnaissance Vehicle (NBCRV) Sensor Suite Upgrade Program.
